attributes.review: if you're wondering if you should download this app, don't do it. i've been on the run, living on the streets, eating food from trashcans, and looking behind my shoulder 24/7, all because of the official trump app 2020. let me tell you my story. i originally downloaded this app because i wanted to keep up with my president. upon downloading, it asked me to fill out all of my personal information: my social security number, my address, my phone number, etc. i was a little hesitant at first but i continued on because what would the president do with my info? nothing bad of course, right? or so i thought. immediately after i filled everything out i heard my doorbell ring. i watched from the stairs as my mom opened the door, getting stabbed in the neck with a tranquilizer containing a mind control potion inside. military men with guns began flooding my house, looking for me. i ran and jumped off my 3rd story balcony onto the sidewalk, breaking one of my legs. i began running for my life. i had nowhere to go, so i decided to go the the place that was most familiar to me, my bestfriends house. her mother opened the door, she greeted me but looked like she was in a daze. i ran to my bestfriend's room to find her lying on her bed, dead. i was too late. written in her blood on the walls was warnings, saying to run. i heard her mom slowly walking upstairs, chanting the words "trump" so i jumped out the window again making a run for it. this time i broke my other leg, i had to run on my hands to the nearest garbage bin i could find for somewhere to sleep. in conclusion, don't download this app unless you want to end up like me.
attributes.title: worst app ever
